startFriendPicker

public void startFriendPicker()
                       throws JibeServiceException,
                              java.lang.IllegalStateException
Launches Arena friend list for in-app friend selection

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the ArenaHelper is not initialized yet or has already been disposed.
JibeServiceException - if there is a problem communication with the Jibe Realtime Engine (an Android background service)
